018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache.eager;
019
020import java.sql.Connection;
021import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
022import java.sql.SQLException;
023
024import net.sf.hajdbc.Database;
025import net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseCluster;
026import net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties;
027import net.sf.hajdbc.Messages;
028import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache;
029import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupport;
030import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory;
031import net.sf.hajdbc.dialect.Dialect;
032
033/**
034 * DatabaseMetaDataCache implementation that eagerly caches data when first flushed.
035 * To be used when performance more of a concern than memory usage.
036 * 
037 * @author Paul Ferraro
038 * @since 2.0
039 */
040public class SharedEagerDatabaseMetaDataCache<Z, D extends Database<Z>> implements DatabaseMetaDataCache<Z, D>
041{
042        private final DatabaseCluster<Z, D> cluster;
043        private final DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory factory;
044
045        private volatile DatabaseProperties properties;
046        
047        public SharedEagerDatabaseMetaDataCache(DatabaseCluster<Z, D> cluster, DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory factory)
048        {
049                this.cluster = cluster;
050                this.factory = factory;
051        }
052        
053        /**
054         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache#flush()
055         */
056        @Override
057        public void flush() throws SQLException
058        {
059                D database = this.cluster.getBalancer().next();
060                
061                if (database == null)
062                {
063                        throw new SQLException(Messages.NO_ACTIVE_DATABASES.getMessage());
064                }
065                
066                this.setDatabaseProperties(database.connect(database.createConnectionSource(), database.decodePassword(this.cluster.getDecoder())));
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * {@inheritDoc}
071         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache#getDatabaseProperties(net.sf.hajdbc.Database, java.sql.Connection)
072         */
073        @Override
074        public synchronized DatabaseProperties getDatabaseProperties(D database, Connection connection) throws SQLException
075        {
076                if (this.properties == null)
077                {
078                        this.setDatabaseProperties(connection);
079                }
080                
081                return this.properties;
082        }
083        
084        private synchronized void setDatabaseProperties(Connection connection) throws SQLException
085        {
086                DatabaseMetaData metaData = connection.getMetaData();
087                Dialect dialect = this.cluster.getDialect();
088                DatabaseMetaDataSupport support = this.factory.createSupport(metaData, dialect);
089                this.properties = new EagerDatabaseProperties(metaData, support, dialect);
090        }
091}
